pr_title: Add a GCThrashingPerPeriod option for MemoryMonitor

timeline.message: Add an GCThrashingPerPeriod option for MemoryMonitor
Add an GCThrashingPerPeriod option for MemoryMonitor

timeline.body:
Avoid confusion with minus sign, and phrase more in terms of behavior. Maybe something like:

> The GC thrashing threshold percentage. A given period of time is considered "thrashing" if this percentage of CPU time is spent in garbage collection. Dataflow will force fail tasks after sustained periods of thrashing."

You could say "percentage in the range (0.0, 100.0)" but I think that is redundant.
